🧾 Headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8' }
📦 Body: {
  "id": 2,
  "title": "Test Book",
  "description": "Auto-generated book",
  "pageCount": 100,
  "excerpt": "Excerpt...",
  "publishDate": "2025-04-07T16:14:05.128Z"
}

📊 Status: 200
